CFGS_more: (Superior Grade in Spain), like NVQ 4 in UK or Junior College in the US.
portfolio_text1: In this page you will find the projects I did (personal projects, academics or in group). You can also find them in my GitHub:
portfolio_buttonGroup_ariaLabel: Button group with a nested menu
aboutPage_text1: This page is built with Vite and React (JS). I also used HTML and CSS.
aboutPage_text2: For the design I used the Material Design (<1>MUI in React) components, and I also took ideas from the following portfolios:
aboutPage_text3: I have been able to develop all the ideas that I had.
aboutPage_text4: I really wanted to use React, I knew this framework because it is one of the most popular in Frontend, but I never used it. For this reason, I watched a <1>Udemy course</1> (it's in Spanish) that helped me to understand the basics of this framework.
aboutPage_text5: On the other hand, I used Vite to reduce wait times while developing, since you can see the changes after saving.
aboutPage_text6: To resolve the doubts and problems that I had, I searched on Google and StackOverflow.

projects.name: SECDS Practice
projects.description: Practice of the subject "Software engineering of components and distributed systems" where I had to develop the functionalities of 3 microservices.

projects.name: DSD Practice 2
projects.description: Practice of the subject "Data structures design" where I had to implement functionalities following TDD.

projects.name: DSD Practice 1
projects.description: Practice of the subject "Data structures design" where I had to create some ADTs and functionalities following TDD.

projects.name: HangmanJS
projects.description: Hangman game in Javascript. Also in ASP.NET in this repository.

projects.name: HositalApp
projects.description: Hospital management application with Windows Forms.

groupProjects.name: EatNow
groupProjects.description: Final project of the .NET Bootcamp, it's an application to make reservations and manage restaurants.

groupProjects.name: ProyectoF
groupProjects.description: Final project of <Tooltip text='WAD'>WAD</Tooltip>, it's an application to buy event tickets.
groupProjects.moreInfo: My two schoolmates developed the Android app, I developed the website and the backend, which provided the data to the app and the website.

groupProjects.name: Mensakas
groupProjects.description: Project that I did in <Tooltip text='WAD'>WAD</Tooltip>, it's an application to make orders (like Glovo).

groupProjects.name: AJAX Kahoot
groupProjects.description: Project that I did in <Tooltip text='WAD'>WAD</Tooltip>, it's an application to make questionnaries like Kahoot.

groupProjects.name: Fallout Terminal
groupProjects.description: Project that I did in <Tooltip text='WAD'>WAD</Tooltip>, it's a game that looks like the terminal from the game Fallout.

groupProjects.name: SynergyET
groupProjects.description: Final project of <Tooltip text='CPAD'>CPAD</Tooltip>, it's an application similar to Moodle but in Android.

groupProjects.name: Scrum management
groupProjects.description: Project that I did in <Tooltip text='CPAD'>CPAD</Tooltip>, it's an application to manage the tasks like in a Scrum board.

groupProjects.name: Car configurator
groupProjects.description: Project that I did in <Tooltip text='CPAD'>CPAD</Tooltip>, it's an application to configure a car and buy it.
groupProjects.moreInfo: It's similar to what you would do in any car brand website.
